Product Features

    * Diagnostic testing
    * Intelligent software identifies strengths & weaknesses
    * Comprehensive & individualized progress charts
    * Easy-to-understand explanations
    * Instant feedback in exercises


Product Description
Product Description
In a fun game-show format, Punctuation Made Easy will familiarize your students with the importance of punctuation - how it works like a code that tells a reader how to read the words on a page. Students will develop strategies for using punctuation effectively to clarify the meaning of their writing. Intelligent software assesses each student's abilities and then presents tutorial lessons for those topics where special attention is needed. The program also includes a special teacher's section where each student's progress report can be viewed. Working independently with Punctuation Made Easy, your students will master punctuation, a key building block for writing and communicating effectively!

Product Description

An interactive punctuation lesson hosted by fun,animated game show hosts



Using the dynamic and engaging approach only a multimedia format can offer,these presentations move beyond traditional textbook diagrams and static rulesto create lessons that instruct and assess progress.  tutorials then targetexactly where progress reports can be viewed.

With this software students can work independently to master these basic skillsand with the time-efficient teacher oversight these CD-ROMs will create keybuilding blocks for writing and communicating proper English more effectively.

It is learning in a fun, fast-paced, game show format.  Teach, practice,implement, test.


    * Customized Tutorials
      Students receive individual evaluations and suggested practice based on diagnostic pre-tests at the beginning of each section.
    * Learn the Power of Punctuation
      Writing skills will improve as students apply punctuation properly and express themselves more effectively.
    * Instant Feedback
      Once exercises are completed, Mike McGee, the animated host, tells students if their answers are right or wrong and explains why.




Apostrophes

    * Contractions
    * Possession
    * Plural Nouns
    * Possessive Pronouns

Commas 

    * Lists
    * With Periods
    * Apposition

Brackets, Hyphens, Dashes, Capital Letters and Periods

    * Ending a Sentence
    * Abbreviations
    * Beginning Sentences 

Product Review from Amazon:My kids also enjoyed this CD in the series and really improved their skills. The format is fun and the "host" makes the teaching of each subject clear and gives plenty of exercises to test themselves. You can keep track of their test scores to see their improvement too.
